QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Distracted driving
QAPair.Answer: Distracted driving is doing any activity that takes your attention away from driving. This includes using a cell phone to call or text while driving. Distracted driving makes you more likely to get into a crash. As a result, many states have enacted laws to help stop the practice. You can avoid distracted driving by learning how to stay safe with a cell phone in the car.
